locations.Fire Temple Fire Dancer Chest: ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or not keysanity) and (can_use(Hammer) or can_use(Hookshot) or has_explosives)
locations.Fire Temple Boss Key Chest:
(
                ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or not keysanity) and can_use(Hammer)) or (can_mega and can_use(Hookshot))
locations.Volvagia Heart:
(can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (Fairy and has_explosives)) and can_use(Hammer) and 
                (Boss_Key_Fire_Temple or at('Fire Temple Flame Maze', True))
locations.Volvagia:
(can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (Fairy and has_explosives)) and can_use(Hammer) and 
                (Boss_Key_Fire_Temple or at('Fire Temple Flame Maze', True))

exits.Fire Temple Middle:
(can_use(Goron_Tunic) or Fairy) and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4) and 
                (has_explosives or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot))

locations.Fire Temple Boulder Maze Bombable Pit:
((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 6) and has_explosives) or
                (((has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5)) or can_weirdshot) and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4))
locations.Fire Temple Scarecrow Chest:
(
                (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 6) or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5) and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4)) ) 
                and (can_use(Scarecrow) or can_hover)
locations.Fire Temple Map Chest:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 6) or ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 5) and can_use(Bow)) or 
                (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5) and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4))
locations.GS Fire Temple East Tower Climb:
(
                (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 6) or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5) and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4)) ) 
                and (can_use(Scarecrow) or can_hover)
locations.GS Fire Temple East Tower Top:
(
                (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 6) or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5) and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4)) ) 
                and (can_use(Scarecrow) or can_hover)
